content.rendered:
Pain-free pet food for dogs of all ages

NUTRITIONALLY COMPLETE VEGAN DOG FOOD

Benevo Dog dog food comes in various dry and wet formulas and contains all the nutrients an adult dog needs including a wide range of vitamins, minerals and essential fatty acids, without the need for supplements or slaughterhouse meat. All our dry foods contain a prebiotic FOS to aid digestion and Benevo Dog Original and Benevo Puppy in particular also contain non-animal Taurine and L-Carnitine supplements.

Shop dog food

SENSITIVE DOG FOOD

Our non-gm wheat free, meat free and dairy free recipes don't contain common allergens including meat proteins and wheat gluten making it a great hypoallergenic option for dogs with a sensitive tummy.

Shop dog food

WHEAT FREE RECIPE

Benevo Dog food is formulated to meet the European nutritional levels set out by FEDIAF making it suitable for most dog breeds. We chose to formulate without wheat where possible as a solution for those owners with dogs who are sensitive to gluten.
Our ingredients are carefully milled before mixing to avoid whole grains which are hard to digest. An added Prebiotic helps digestion and omega oils provide a source of essential fatty acids.
Always check the ingredients if you are looking to avoid certain allergens.

Shop dog food

IS IT NATURAL?

Dogs are classed as omnivores, so like us humans, they can survive and thrive on a plant-based diet too. Studies suggest dogs split from wolves around 20,000-40,000 years ago and they were domesticated between 15,000-30,000 year ago. So they have lived with humans co-existing on the same foods ever since. So yes, professional meat-free food for dogs is fine and as natural as giving them a name, buying them birthday presents and having them on a lead 🙂

Shop dog food

For many, it's hard to believe a healthy vegan dog food exists, so we think it's important to explain where our journey began

2004

2005

We began researching the nutritional needs of Dogs using established international guidelines

Next we scoured the planet looking for reliable suppliers of those nutrients from non-animal sources

Then, working alongside independent animal nutritionists we balanced a suitable recipe

Finally, we took our own money and made the 1st meat-free, wheat-free dog food in the UK

Ready to switch?

Great! Then here are Benevo products suitable for dogs.

Want to try before you buy?

In our experience dogs, take very well to our foods, however we understand if you want to try a small amount first, so before committing to a large bag or tray consider buying a sample from our samples page.

would you like to know more?

We know you care a lot about your dog and a change in diet is a big consideration, so why not check out our FAQ's for some reassurance.
